Description:
Detect when authentications to important application(s) only required single-factor authentication

Author: MikeDuddington, '@dudders1'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Authentications To Important Apps Using Single Factor Authentication
Query: sourcetype="azure-signinlogs" status="Success" appid="Insert Application ID use OR for multiple" authenticationrequirement="singleFactorAuthentication"
